description: The 20 primes inside the 4 X 4 matrix with all the rows, columns and major diagonals being reversible non-palindromic and distinct primes (the smallest prime-magical square): [ 1933, 1283, 9551, 3719 ].
links: C. Rivera, The Prime Problems and Puzzles Connection
Index entries for sequences related to magic squares
author: _Carlos Rivera_
